about_the_game:
Fantasy-themed RPG BGM created with orchestral soundtracks, evoking the imagery of forests, meadows, and lush green landscapes.

This music will immerse your game in an enchanting fantasy world, making you feel like wandering through the fields endlessly.

All tracks are designed to seamlessly loop.

*******************************************
●Audio: 6 Tracks

●Themes in mind for each tracks
DLC_RPGFMPG_01: Gentle, powerful
DLC_RPGFMPG_02: Calm, Beautiful
DLC_RPGFMPG_03: Melancholy, Dusk
DLC_RPGFMPG_04: Mysterious, Enigmatic, Night
DLC_RPGFMPG_05: Slight Sadness, Powerful, Fantastical
DLC_RPGFMPG_06: Slight Sadness, Powerful, Life

*******************************************


・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
